childMarkdownRemark.excerpt: A lot of office workers, and IT professionals in particular, often think that they need to ignore fitness and health problems to focus on…

childMarkdownRemark.html:
A lot of office workers, and IT professionals in particular, often think that they need to ignore fitness and health problems to focus on their passion for the job.

But what do you think if I tell you that, it’s NOT a choice and you can have BOTH?

It’s definitely a challenge to work on a health plan, a diet and a workout routine, especially when you are just starting out. That’s why we invited one of our health and fitness enthusiast Luan Nguyen into the talk, and to give us some stepping stones on our health journey.

If you’re interested in the event, please fill out the registration form below, and your meeting invite will be sent to you when we’re approaching the date!

Fitness for IT Professionals

Speaker: Luan Nguyen - Senior Software Engineer @ RedBubble

Now, Luan is NOT a certified health professional, but with his many years of research on body transformations for himself, and the wellbeing of his family and friends, he sure can give us some guidelines to follow, right?

Date: Sat, Jun 19 2021

Time: 6:00 PM (MEL/SYD/BNE time)

Location: Online.

Facebook event: VAIT Group Event

Registration link: Google Form

If you need to discuss or need any updates, please feel free to join our facebook group Vietnamese Aussies in IT and our Discord server at VAIT - Vietnamese Aussies in IT Discord Server. See you there!

shortBio.shortBio:
We're a group of IT Geeks in Australia.

Come find us on [GitHub](https://github.com/viet-aus-it/ "VAIT GitHub"), [Discord](https://chat.vietausit.com "VAIT Discord"), Facebook [group](https://fb.vietausit.com/ "VAIT FB Group") and [page](https://www.facebook.com/vietausit "VAIT FB Page").
